prompts: Create a playful fighting-type Pokemon with a round body and cheerful expression.
Show me a yellow Pokemon that has boxing gloves and a friendly demeanor.
Design a Pokemon that loves to train, featuring a strong build and an upbeat personality.
Generate an adorable Pokemon with a chubby shape and a determined look on its face.
Imagine a powerful fighting Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and enjoys challenges.
Give me a small Pokemon that embodies strength and resilience, perfect for battles.
Make a cute yet tough Pokemon that is known for its loyalty and fun-loving nature.
